text: Vira Silenti (Elvira Giovene; 16 April 1931 - 1 November 2014) was an Italian actress. She was known for her roles in I Vitelloni, The Story of Joseph and his Brethren, and in Atlas Against the Cyclops. Silenti was born in Naples, Italy. Silenti was hit by a car on 31 October 2014 in Rome, Italy. She died the next day from her injuries at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Campania Category:Italian movie actors Category:Actors from Naples Category:Road accident deaths
title: Vira Silenti
